Question: In 1940, this person met Cuban-born bandleader Desi Arnaz while filming the Rodgers and Hart stage hit Too Many Girls.
Hints: When he was born, I Love Lucy was a solid ratings hit, and this person and Arnaz wrote the pregnancy into the show.
Her aorta had ruptured in a second location and this person quickly lost consciousness.
Like many budding starlets this person picked up radio work to earn side income as well as gain exposure.
